resources.string: Have you expirienced any of the common symptoms of COVID 19?
Have you, within the last ten days, expirienced an internal tempature of 100.4Â°?
Have you come in close contact with someone with a suspected or confirmed case of COVID-19 within the past 10 days?
Have you travelled outside the country within the past 10 days?
Do you affirm that all of your selections are the complete and honest truth?
If you do not select yes for the final question, then you cannot submit this form.
You are not safe to come in today. Please get a COVID test as soon as you are able.
You are safe to enter work/school.
Enter the form once you have completed all of the questions.
Please fill out the form again in 10 minutes. If your tempature is still above 100.4 then, than you will not be permitted to go to school/work
Please wait. It has not been 10 minutes.
